sentences.sentence: Some time after the elevation of M. Myriel to the episcopate, the Emperor had made HIM a baron of the Empire, in company with many other bishops.
sentences.translation: 米里哀先生升任主教不久，皇上便封了他为帝国的男爵，同时也封了好几个旁的主教。

sentences.sentence: It makes all the bishops equivalently say that before they received the episcopate they had for some time exercised the duties of the priesthood.
sentences.translation: 它令所有主教等效说，之前他们得到的主教，他们曾在一段时间行使职责的神职人员。
